website_summaries.verdict: A well-made pet casket fitting for pets of various sizes with satin cushioning inside. A good value from a top company in pet caskets.
pros: Non-biodegradable polystyrene build that is airtight and watertight
Features a satin mattress and lace-trimmed pillow
Comes in several sizes and color combinations
cons: May not hold up to large amounts of heavy soil

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and sturdy; allows for customization
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to bury my kitty after her unfortunate and untimely passing. I was so happy to find such a lovely casket; the pink cushions were perfect for her. The outside is very sturdy, which is to be expected; this material is often used for supplies that are often subjected to extreme conditions and is part of why I ordered this specific product. I was also happy that I was easily able to customize the casket and paint a portrait of her. In part because of this casket I will always be able to have her nearby without having to have her cremated, which is a huge deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: We've used these caskets to bury all 6 of our ...
customer_reviews.text: We've used these caskets to bury all 6 of our boxers over the years... it gives us a peace of mind knowing they were not just buryied in a plastic bag or otherwise... our pet give so much to us during their life... and deserve a descent burial... They are a part of our life ...but we are their entire life...and we don't let them down in death...
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: A necessary purchase for your beloved.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was thinner than I imagined it being, (perhaps that's just me), but it's overall exactly what I expected. It was a very hard day for me to use this, but having this for that day was a great gift to my beloved. He deserved having a soft and safe resting space.
customer_reviews.author: Osetia

customer_reviews.title: Best for My Fur Baby
customer_reviews.text: A sad time for all of us who go through this process, but to review this product I will. I was pleased with my purchase from this company. They were compassionate and concerned that I would receive my purchase on time. It is very nice and a perfect size small for my 6 lb. PERSIAN kitty. It is light enough to carry easily. It's pretty inside and I will add my rose petals and his furry bed. It is an air tight product which gives me peace knowing he is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Though my heart is heavy because this was needed, I will say that it was exactly what I was looking for. I couldn't stand the thought of having my dog cremated, thinking of his soft fur being burned was too painful. It perfectly fit my sweet dog with enough room for his bed, pillow, & blanket so he's comfortable for his final rest. (I used his own bedding, not what came with the casket). It's very sturdy & the tape sealed it up securely. I'm glad I found this so it could be delivered quickly enough to bring my sweet boy back home where he belongs.
customer_reviews.author: StarfishGH

customer_reviews.title: Pet Casket
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the pet casket. I am thankful I do not have to use right now but my dog is in late stage congestive heart failure and so happy I have this so when the times comes she will rest in peace because we love her so much ! Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Parker

customer_reviews.title: Did not send all the materials...
customer_reviews.text: They did not send the sealing tape that's supposed to go with the casket. I understand it probably doesn't make much of a difference, but I guess it wouldn't make much of a difference burying my Dog without one. Just a little upsetting when I'm going to bury my Dog and the top is on very loosely and the product is not as described. It's supposed to be sealed. So now of course it's not sealed and that kinda defeats the purpose. You go through all of this for peace of mind, not so that you think about your little Dog beating eaten by bugs and getting wet almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not Air Tight
customer_reviews.text: This casket is not Air Tight when closed , the experience has been devastating that my pet Was not able to be buried when he was supposed to ... I had to buy an epoxy product to seal the casket , gasses where emiting! Far from Air Tight. Dont make the same mistake I did , horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis l.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry for your loss
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what it's for. I thought it was a little pricey but your pets are family, they deserve better than a cardboard box. I'll need another one soon. I will be sure another one like this will be used and bought from same people.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Giguere

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect..
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect .... exactly what I needed. I had my dog for 14 years and I wanted her to be buried properly Thank you ... it was beautiful, thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: deborah garcia

customer_reviews.title: but would not recommend buying this
customer_reviews.text: It looks as pictured. But it is really pricey for what you get. It is just a plastic box with some double sided tape to help secure the lid. It says it is double walled, but I don't see that. We are keeping it, but would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace
customer_reviews.text: We were so grateful we chose the Pet Memory Shop pet casket!!!! Loosing our dog Molly was devistating! We had concerns about burrying her in our backyard as we planned. This casket provided a great comfort!! It was attractive and felt special. The seal provided gave us relief for her safety. There was a very touching note we saved expressing sympathy and inspiration to cherish our memories!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Nugent

customer_reviews.title: From a sad Mommy
customer_reviews.text: As difficult as the whole ordeal of my little man Gunnar Banks waa, I have to say this item was awesome. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Would recommended to everyone the inside was really pretty with the cushion and pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I received my order in about 2 weeks. It is really nice. I would definitely recommend to everyone, but if you get a small make sure your animal is small enough to fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal prpoerly
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with the casket is it did not seal properly. I had to use it as it came the day before my dog died. I had to work with it to, hopefully, get it to seal. I would not buy this again or reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small for my 6.5lb cat and had plenty of room to put her fav toys in with her. I would highly recommend! The only negative was you had to put stripping tape around it and I was worried I didn’t do it correctly or seal it well. The box itself was fantastic! It definitely gave me peace.
customer_reviews.author: Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: it was sturdy as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Although I wish I did not need the casket, it was sturdy as advertized. I believe the medium size as advertized needs to be updated. My shituz was 25lbs and she barley fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: This was amazing, and arrived super quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing, and arrived super quickly. Its unfortunate to have to need it, but I was glad this was an option when I did
customer_reviews.author: iamaustin

customer_reviews.title: Solid casket for a loved pet
customer_reviews.text: Fulfilled the need for our dear, departed Boston Terrier. Seems a touch overpriced, but the best we could find for our needs. Shipped rapidly and arrived when needed.
customer_reviews.author: EJF

customer_reviews.title: Dignified burial option worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction. Dignified burial option. Closure tape provided and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Frostsdad

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Great quality and quick shipment.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality. It arrived quickly which was very important. Our beloved kitty had to stay at the vet hospital until it arrived and her burial could take place. I wish it would have included a matching sack/ coverlet to place over the animal, or to place the animal inside. Maybe that can be added by the manufacturer for future buyers. No regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robin Webb

customer_reviews.title: but it was nice to be able to bury a family friend in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect. Seemed a bit pricey, but it was nice to be able to bury a family friend in something better than a plain box. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J.Mac

customer_reviews.title: Not deep enough. I have an 18 lb. ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Was a comfort to use when I needed it. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TX Rain

customer_reviews.title: Pet Casket
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this casket as our cat passed away with cancer, it was made very well, cannot say enough about it
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: maybe like $75. 00
customer_reviews.text: I believe it is over priced, maybe like $75.00. Very very thin
customer_reviews.author: ernest watts

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I made this
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner . Very high quality product. I'm happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mark james

customer_reviews.title: Prepare ahead of time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and put it in the basement. Our last pet died too suddenly, and it is nice to be prepared!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item is of high quality and looks very nice. It was held up in Customs for a day or two, but still arrived within less than a week. Highly recommend this item and vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your furry friends
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your furry friends. Sad time but I feel better knowing my dog is protected in a water tight non-biodegradable place.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty picky with pet loss and it seemed weaker than ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty picky with pet loss and it seemed weaker than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: DSSD PETS

customer_reviews.title: Everything was as I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Thank for your timely delivery. Everything was just as I had ordered. This is not something I wish to talk about as I lost a very special and dearly loved pet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pet Memory Shop Pet Casket 3 Colors - Pet Loss Burial Memorial - USA's #1 Choice for Dogs, Cats, Animals, Gifts (Classical Series)
feature_bullets: AMERICA’S #1 PET CASKET. 10,000+ satisfied customers, absolute commitment to service and quality control. Choose the safe and trusted brand in your time of need.

SEND YOUR PET TO THE RAINBOW BRIDGE IN A DIGNIFIED, RESPECTFUL, LOVING, AND SECURE MANNER. Provide a peaceful service for all the love your pet has given. Our pets are family and a plastic bag or hole in the ground doesn’t adequately honor or protect our pets remains. Frequently an educational experience for children.

STRONG, SECURE, AND DURABLE. Not your ordinary plastic - will not crack, bend, or break during/after burial. Rest assured about the safety of your pet’s resting place. Suitable for dogs, cats, and other animals.

AIR-TIGHT, WATER-TIGHT, & NON-BIODEGRADABLE. Protects against scavengers and eliminates the risk of environmental contamination. Biodegradable caskets are not safe for the environment if your pet has been euthanized due to the chemicals in euthanasia anesthetics and drugs.
LUXURIOUS AND BEAUTIFUL SATIN/SILK FABRIC - Respectfully luxurious- soft, smooth, and never any defects. Each casket includes silk/satin pillow and plush mattress.
